alert.note: Alert for Norfolk; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 3:33PM EST until December 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton MA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Massachusetts... Neponset River At Norwood affecting Suffolk and Norfolk Counties. For the Neponset River...including Norwood...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neponset River at Norwood. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs along the Neponset River in Norwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 9.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.2 feet on 06/07/1982. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 345 AM EST.
